entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 10 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
